articles.author: Candace Sutton
articles.title: Covid 19 coronavirus: How it kills in 'ferocious rampage' from brain to toes - New Zealand Herald
articles.description: Coronavirus kills in 'a ferocious rampage through the body, from brain to toes '.
articles.content:
Covid-19 kills "in a ferocious rampage through the body from brain to toes" doctors have explained, saying the virus "acts like no pathogen humanity has ever seen".
